resources.string: Need some help with the game. Well here is a little information that covers the ins and outs of BombSurge.ENJOY!
When you successfully hit a certain amount of bombs your combo will build and your points multiply by that combo amount. Once you hit three your combo surges.
Weapon Effect: When the gun is het your weapon type "MAY" change. (Special weapon effects are not included at the moment)
Weapon Effect: When the wizard hat is hit. Your bullet amount "MAY" multiply.
THE NUKE!! A special little item that clears the board. Very Strong. Very Helpful. WARNING: If nuke hits bottom it will take away 5 lives.
A diving bomb that is worth 1 but takes away two. It GOES FAST!!
The main source of points in game. Worth 1 point. Caution! If you try to hit the most recent dropped it is in immunity mode.
A bomb worth two points but equally takes away two points.
A Surge Item: When the bolt is hit you trigger a surge. This surge causes everything to speed up. Except for time. Can be difficult.
A Surge Item: When the snow man head is hit you trigger a surge. This surge causes everything to slow down. Except for time. Use it wisely.
IMPORTANT: One of the most important bombs in game. You have to constantly hit the bomb clocks to gain 2 more seconds on your clock.
